sentences.en: As we know prolixity is a big shortcoming to write articles.

sentences.en: He is too proud to see his own shortcoming.

sentences.en: Peter was painfully aware of his own shortcomings.

sentences.en: Premature convergence is the fatal shortcoming of traditional evolutionary programming.

sentences.en: The shortcoming is the relatively slow data transmission rate.

sentences.en: There's only one shortcoming of my super car - the pace is too slow.

trans.tran_en: a fault or weakness that makes someone or something less successful or effective than they should be
